HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: From 9 € to 60 € depending on the product. For orders with multiple items, the shipping cost of the item with the highest shipping tariff is charged.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 1-3 working days after dispatch. Delivery is made on weekdays until 16:00.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Free shipping for orders over 1000€ does not apply to islands. Specific surcharge is not mentioned.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: From 9 € to 60 € depending on the product. For orders with multiple items, the shipping cost of the item with the highest shipping tariff is charged.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 1-3 working days after dispatch. Delivery is made on weekdays until 16:00.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Free shipping for orders over 1000€ does not apply to islands. Specific surcharge is not mentioned.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery for all products, including bulky furniture, across Croatia. No other delivery methods like parcel shops, parcel lockers, or in-store pickup are mentioned.
PROVIDERS: Deliveries are handled by unspecified courier services ('kurirska služba') and Croatian Post ('Hrvatska pošta').
PRICING: Shipping costs range from 9 € to 60 € per product. For orders with multiple items, the highest single shipping cost applies to the entire order. Shipping is free for orders over 1000 €, but this does not apply to island deliveries.
DELIVERY TIME & RESTRICTIONS: Standard delivery takes 1-3 working days after the item is dispatched. Deliveries are only made on weekdays until 16:00. There is no mention of express or weekend delivery options.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The primary business is furniture, so all shipping policies apply to bulky items. There is an explicit exception for islands regarding the free shipping threshold, implying a surcharge exists, but the specific cost is not detailed. No cash on delivery surcharge is mentioned.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a dedicated 'Dostava i montaža' page and is relatively easy to find. The pricing structure is clearly explained. However, it lacks specifics on which courier services are used (besides Croatian Post) and the exact delivery costs for islands. The absence of alternative delivery methods like parcel points or lockers is a limitation.
